TextView.android:text: The Faculty of Law, Lagos State University is the flagship of the University. The Faculty is equipped with adequate manpower and resourceful personnel in terms of academic and non-academic staff. With a well equipped library and internet facilities, the Faculty produces first class graduates of law who compete favourably anywhere they find themselves whether in practice, academia or industry. It is therefore my pleasure to welcome you to join the Faculty to pursue your academic programme with us in the exciting atmosphere of Lagos.
